name: shopping-list
title: Shopping List
description: The Shopping List App for VTEX IO made by Avanti.

settingsSchema.title: Shopping List
settingsSchema.description: Use this configurations to enable or disable features of this App.

shopAllItems.title: Shopping All Items
shopAllItems.description: Show the button that allows to add all items.

shopIndividualItem.title: Shopping Individual Item
shopIndividualItem.description: Show the button beside the items that allows to add an individual product to the cart.

quantitySelectorUnitPosition.title: Quantity selector measurement unit on the side
quantitySelectorUnitPosition.description: Changes the quantity selector measurement unit position from bottom to the side

showQuantitySelector.title: Show quantity selector on Add to Shopping List modal
showQuantitySelector.description: Show quantity selector on Add to Shopping List modal or not

lowProductAvailabilityAlert.title: Low product availability alert
lowProductAvailabilityAlert.description: Show an alert at the bottom of the product when its availability is equal to or less than the minimum value to show alert

shareActionRequiresLogin.title: Share list require logged user
shareActionRequiresLogin.description: When active and the user click on share list button, it will redirect the user to login

allowIndividualItem.title: Allow to add individual items
allowIndividualItem.description: An add to cart button will be in each product action section
